title: CRISPR Optimization Platform
description: Developed a machine learning algorithm to predict optimal CRISPR guide RNAs for gene editing, improving efficiency by 35%.

title: Stem Cell Regeneration Study
description: Investigated novel pathways in neural stem cell differentiation with implications for neurodegenerative disease treatments.

title: Cancer Biomarker Discovery

title: Drug Resistance Mechanisms
description: Characterized molecular mechanisms of drug resistance in breast cancer cell lines, leading to a new therapeutic approach.
